title: Emmerdale spoilers: Vanessa exposes the truth about Frank's death?
text:
Disaster struck in Emmerdale several months back when Kerry (Laura Norton) and Amy (Natalie Ann Jamieson) ended up causing a fire at the factory — a blaze which led to Frank Clayton (Michael Praed) losing his life. However — with Vanessa (Michelle Hardwick) very much aware of the truth — could she be about to expose the culprits in the coming episodes as she’s quizzed by the police?

With Kerry in hospital following their confrontation, Tracy (Amy Walsh) is wracked with guilt. In an attempt to ease her conscience, both Vanessa and Charity (Emma Atkins) do everything they can to convince her that what happened wasn’t her fault. However, things go from bad to worse when Amy shows up to collect a few things for her mum.

Whilst there, she reveals that she’s planning on telling the police about how Tracy is the person responsible for Kerry’s injuries — a revelation that leaves Tracy shaken. Once again, Vanessa and Charity come to her aid, reassuring her that Amy wouldn’t risk revealing what transpired and that she’s simply trying to scare her.

Determined to defend her sister, Vanessa confronts Amy. An argument between the two women ensues — during which, Vanessa accidentally hits a nurse. As a result, she’s arrested.

Knowing that Vanessa is at the police station fills Amy with dread, as she ponders whether or not Vanessa will reveal the truth about the fire.

Will Vanessa spill the beans about Kerry and Amy’s involvement in the factory inferno?

Frank was her dad, after all, and she’ll likely be determined to get justice for him considering Kerry allowed him to be implicated in the fire knowing full well that he had nothing to do with it.

Or will Vanessa perhaps refrain from telling the truth? After all, doing so could implicate both her and Tracy in regards to Kerry’s current condition.
